name: Leg Terror
description:
"LEG TERROR" is local multiplayer game (1v1) in which Players controll a mad man. One of them controlls legs (he must kill people!) and the other one controlls hands (he must avoid to kill people!). You have to use only one gamepad, all you need are two sticks, each for body parts.

GOOD LUCK!

"LEG TERROR" was made at SENSEI GAMEJAM by Katarzyna Wilczek, Grzegorz Sobański and Adam Głów.

Music: Maciej Dąbrowski
